# Recommended Repository Topics

Add these topics to the GitHub repository via Settings > General > Topics:

## Primary Topics (Required)
- `database`
- `typescript`
- `local-first`
- `offline-first`
- `indexeddb`

## Feature Topics
- `reactive`
- `sync`
- `realtime`
- `opfs`

## Framework Topics
- `react`
- `react-hooks`

## Category Topics
- `web-database`
- `client-database`
- `browser-database`
- `local-storage`

## Ecosystem Topics
- `javascript`
- `nodejs`
- `pnpm`
- `monorepo`

## Instructions

1. Go to https://github.com/pocket-db/pocket
2. Click the gear icon next to "About" in the right sidebar
3. Add topics from the list above (GitHub allows up to 20 topics)
